word: I want to say, never repeat to another soul as long as you live the words that W. C. White manipulates my writings and changes them. This is just what the devil is trying to make all believe. W. C. White is true as steel to the cause of God, and no lie which is in circulation is of the truth.--Letter 143, 1906, p. 1. (To Edson and Emma White, May 21, 1906.)
